response.original_title: Unshakeable Belief: The Dr. Christine Grant Story
response.overview: Unshakeable Belief documents the impact Dr. Christine Grant in her work to build equal opportunities for women in college athletics. The film tells the story of her early years at The University of Iowa as Athletics Director for Women’s Athletics, and her work in drafting articles and lobbying for Title IX, all while building Women’s Athletics at The University of Iowa from the ground up. Unshakeable Belief is a celebration of her life and the lasting impact of what she achieved not just athletics at The University of Iowa, but across the nation.
response.title: Unshakeable Belief: The Dr. Christine Grant Story
